channel.title: Microsoft 365 on Integrations IT Solutions
channel.description: Recent content in Microsoft 365 on Integrations IT Solutions

item.title: Develop Low- and Pro-Code Agents and Copilots for Microsoft 365
item.description:
Developing Low-Code and Pro-Code Agents and Copilots for Microsoft 365

Join our comprehensive course designed for Microsoft 365 and AI developers to master the art of developing low-code and pro-code agents and copilots for Microsoft 365. This program promises to elevate your development skills, making you proficient in the tools used to architect Copilots.

In this journey, you will first embark on an exploration of the world of Microsoft 365 and its Copilot ecosystem. You will receive an overview of the key concepts of Copilots and how to extend them in the Microsoft 365 environment.

item.title: Microsoft 365 Development Fundamentals
item.description:
The five days workshop Microsoft 365 Development Fundamentals is a series of modules that provide an in-depth introduction to Microsoft 365 development. It covers theory, demos, hands-on labs as well as deployment and best practices.

The workshop is designed for developers aiming to implement Microsoft 365 solutions and covers the following topics:

  • Introduction to Microsoft 365 Development: Provides an overview of Microsoft 365 services, apps, and extension patterns, and discusses the integration with Azure and app deployment processes.
